comment: Amazing Professor! Great Teacher! Class was more of a discussion than lecture over various issues in the workplace. Her exams are easy and they were even group exams. She also give you a study guide. You also have make your own questions from the readings, but its really easy! Great Elective! Would take again!

Dr. Boyd is awesome!!! One of my fav. professors at ksu. 3 tests which are not hard. Ask her to take them with partners she might let you. 1 paper not hard at all. no group projects.  Talk during her discussions and interact! She is VERY knowledgeable on the subject and knows what she's talking about. Very sweet, caring, funny, awesome professor.
Overall pretty easy class. Show up and do the work and you will easily pass. Great professor.

TAKE HER!!! Course was very easy. Professor Boyd made the class super simple and easy to follow along. I took her as a HYBRID course. Videos/ lectures were online and easy to follow. There's 8 in-class assignments, 5 of highest are graded. 2 in class group assignments, also very easy. She has a peculiar personality and loves to teach.
Such a nice lady. Although the material is dull, she makes it interesting with her field knowledge and humor. More people should take her!!!!
